item.title: This Week’s Japanese Game Releases: Pokemon Legends: Z-A, STARBITES, more
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Keeper, BALL x PIT, Escape from Duckov, etc.

Pokemon Legends: Z-A for Switch 2 and Switch, and STARBITES for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Switch are the highlights of this week’s Japanese video game releases. 

Also due out this week are Keeper for Xbox Series and PC, BALL x PIT for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC, and Escape from Duckov for PC.

Get the full list of this week’s Japanese game releases below. It should be noted that Gematsu will receive a small percentage of money from purchases made through Play-Asia links. You can also save five percent with our multi-use “GEMATSU2025” coupon code.

Hardware

  • Nintendo Switch 2 Pokemon Legends: Z-A Edition Bundle
    • Asian Version
  • ROG Xbox Ally
  • ROG Xbox Ally X

Physical and Digital

  • Akupara Narrative Pack (Switch)
    • Asian Version (Switch)
  • Pokemon Legends: Z-A (Switch 2, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (Switch 2, Switch)
    • European Version (Switch 2, Switch)
    • Asian Version (Switch 2, Switch)
  • Japan Train Models – Deluxe (Switch)
  • Just Dance 2026 Edition (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
    • Asian Version (Switch)
  • KAMITSUBAKI CITY ENSEMBLE (Switch) – Already available digitally worldwide.
  • STARBITES (PS5, Switch)

Digital-Only

  • BALL x PIT (PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • CUFFBUST (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Ember Knights: Heroes of the Nexus Edition (PS5, Xbox Series) – Launching worldwide.
  • Escape from Duckov (PC [Steam, Epic Games Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • GHOST TRAVELER: Adventures in Edo (Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Infinos (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Infinos 2 (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Just Dance 2026 Edition (PS5, Xbox Series) – Launching worldwide.
  • KAKU: Ancient Seal (PS5, Xbox Series) – Launching worldwide.
  • Keeper (Xbox Series, PC [Steam, Microsoft Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Lords of Ravage (PC [Steam, GOG]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Lumo 2 (PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • One Military Camp (PS5, Xbox Series) – Launching worldwide.
  • Overthrown (PS5, Xbox Series, PC [Steam, Microsoft Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Reach (PS VR2, SteamVR, Quest) – Launching worldwide.
  • STARBITES (Xbox Series) – Launching worldwide.
  • Undusted: Letters from the Past (Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.

The PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch titles listed above can be purchased through Japanese PlayStation Network and Nintendo accounts using prepaid cards:

  • PlayStation Store cards (yen): 1,100 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 10,000
  • Nintendo eShop cards (yen): 1,000 / 1,500 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 9,000

Demos, Betas, Updates, etc.

  • ARC Raiders “Server Slam” Open Test (PS5, Xbox Series, PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Dragon Quest Smash/Grow Closed Beta Test (iOS, Android) – Launching worldwide.
  • Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising Downloadable Content Character Meg (PS5, PS4, PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Hell Maiden Demo (PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact Downloadable Content Character Neferpitou (PS5, Switch, PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • LET IT DIE: INFERNO Limited-Time Demo (PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Street Fighter 6 Downloadable Content Character C. Viper (PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PS4, PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Tekken 8 Downloadable Content Character Armor King (PS5, Xbox Series, PC) – Launching worldwide.
  • Zenless Zone Zero Version 2.3 Update “Memories of Dreams Bygone” (PS5, Xbox Series, PC, iOS, Android) – Launching worldwide.

item.title: Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PS4, and PC
item.content:encoded:
Gameplay Group has announced Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game, a fast-paced one-versus-one fighting game coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam in summer 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game is a fighter rooted in the spirit of elemental mastery. Designed for both newcomers and veterans, it channels the energy of classic fighting games while breaking new ground in movement, style, and combat expression. Built with a focus on fluidity, responsiveness, and online integrity, the game invites players to discover what it truly means to fight with purpose. Hand-drawn in 2D, it is crafted to preserve the style and expressive animation of the original series.

Key Features

  • 12 playable characters at launch, with many more released via Season Model.
  • Selectable support characters influence your fighting style and grant special moves.
  • Unique “Flow System” with movement centric gameplay.
  • Single-player campaign with original narrative.
  • Combo Trials.
  • Gallery Mode.
  • Best in class net code and cross-play.
  • Additional features and mechanics to be announced soon!

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/avatar-legends-the-fighting-game-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-switch-2-ps4-and-pc

item.title: Tekken 8 DLC character Miary Zo launches December 1 for Season 2 Character Pass owners, December 4 for all
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Or on December 1 for Season 2 Character Pass owners.

Tekken 8 downloadable content character Miary Zo will launch on December 1 for Season 2 Character Pass owners and December 4 for all users, Bandai Namco announced.

Here is her character profile, via Bandai Namco:

Miary Zo

  • Nationality: Madagascar
  • Height: 158cm / 5.2ft
  • Age: 18
  • Favorite Food: Ravitoto
  • Birthday: March 20
  • Interests: Observing animals
  • Fighting Style: Moraingy and other African martial arts

Miary Zo, a curious lover of animals and their habitats, discovered martial arts by mimicking animal movements. She shares a close bond with a ring-tailed lemur parent and child named “Vanilla” and “Cacao.”

Tekken 8 is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC Character Miary Zo Gameplay Trailer

English

Japanese
